revised_title: Predicting the Motion of the Second Comet
tldr: Monsieur Auzout predicts the motion of the second comet and shares his ephemerides with the Royal Society. He observes the comet's slow movement, its brightness, and its train's splendor. Auzout hopes that his predictions will help verify his method for various types of comets and contribute to the understanding of celestial mechanics and the Earth's motion.
